name: blog
description: A dynamic blog built with Next.js, Netlify CMS and Firebase. It has a comment and like system, displays an Instagram feed.

name: visual-fretboard
description: An application to visualize notes, chords and scales on the guitar fretboard. Includes a metronome and the ability to get the tempo and scale of any Spotify song.

name: magnificent-weather
description: An application to obtain weather data from any city in the world.

name: basement-challenge
description: Challenge by Gonzalo Pozzo and Basement Studio. The idea was to create the front-end of a store applying a design that they gave us in Figma. It has a cart system and consumes the products from a mock.

name: law-firm
description: Template for building a static website with Next.js and Netlify CMS.

name: cognizant-softvision-challenge
description: A small practice application to manage a recruitment process.
